revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3568;RK3568B2; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U12832F; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNFAMML-XRNEE; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1E:06

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ODROID-M1", "REV 1.0 20211112", "Made In Korea", and "HARDKERNEL" are silkscreened on board top. :"Made In Korea" and "Design by ruppi.kim@hardkernel.com" are silkscreened on board bottom.
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available. {{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3568B2 @2.0GHz Quad-Core :SoC: ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52 MP2'' @650MHz (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash, eMMC module connector, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card, NVMe SSD (M.2) slot, :1x SATA 3.0 port *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM @1560MHz (''SK hynix'') *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 2.0 OTG ports :(USB 2.0 OTG has priority over 2nd USB 3.0 port) *PCIe: 1x M.2 (M key) socket *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 7.5V ~ 15.5V via barrel (12V/2A recommended)
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-m1/odroid-m1 ''ODROID-M1'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/03/29/hardkernel-launches-odroid-m1-rockchip-rk3568b2-sbc/ ''Hardkernel launches ODROID-M1 Rockchip RK3568B2 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/hardkernels-newest-odroid-m1-enters-the-sbc-market%ef%bf%bc/ ''Hardkernel’s newest ODROID-M1 enters the SBC market'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
